messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
절점 1번을 원점에, 절점 2번을 (3, 0, 0)에 추가해줘

절점 2개가 추가되었습니다.
- 절점 1번: (0, 0, 0) 원점
- 절점 2번: (3, 0, 0)
두 절점 사이 거리는 3m입니다.

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/node","description":"Create or add nodes to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Node assignments with node number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
절점 3번 좌표를 (5, 2, 0)으로 변경해줘
절점 3번의 좌표가 (5, 2, 0)으로 업데이트되었습니다.

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"PUT /db/node","description":"Update existing nodes in the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Node assignments with node number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
절점 1번과 2번을 연결하는 보 요소를 만들어줘. 재료 1번, 단면 1번 사용.

messages.name: POST /db/elem
messages.content: {"ELEM":{"1":{"TYPE":"BEAM","MATL":1,"SECT":1,"NODE":[1,2],"ANGLE":0}}}

보(BEAM) 요소 1번이 생성되었습니다.
- 연결 절점: 1번 → 2번
- 재료: 1번
- 단면: 1번

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/elem","description":"Create or add elements to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Element assignments with element number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
SS400 강재를 재료 1번으로 등록해줘

재료 1번으로 SS400 강재가 등록되었습니다.
- 탄성계수: 210,000,000 kN/m² (210 GPa)
- 포아송비: 0.3
- 단위중량: 76.98 kN/m³

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/matl","description":"Create or add materials to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Material assignments with material number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
H형강 H-300x150x6.5x9 단면을 1번으로 생성해줘

단면 1번으로 H형강 H-300x150x6.5x9이 생성되었습니다.
- 높이(H): 300mm
- 폭(B): 150mm
- 웨브 두께(tw): 6.5mm
- 플랜지 두께(tf): 9mm

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/sect","description":"Create or add sections to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Section assignments with section number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
고정하중 하중케이스를 추가해줘

messages.name: POST /db/stld
messages.content: {"STLD":{"Dead Load":{"DESC":"고정하중 (자중 포함)","TYPE":"D"}}}

고정하중(Dead Load) 하중케이스가 추가되었습니다.
- 이름: Dead Load
- 설명: 고정하중 (자중 포함)
- 유형: D (사하중)

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/stld","description":"Create static load cases in the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Load case assignments with load case name as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
절점 1번을 고정단으로 구속해줘. 모든 자유도를 구속해야 해.

messages.name: POST /db/bncf
messages.content: {"BNCF":{"1":{"DX":true,"DY":true,"DZ":true,"RX":true,"RY":true,"RZ":true}}}

절점 1번에 고정단(Fixed Support) 경계조건이 설정되었습니다.
- 병진 구속: DX, DY, DZ (모두 구속)
- 회전 구속: RX, RY, RZ (모두 구속)
6자유도 모두 구속된 완전 고정단입니다.

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/bncf","description":"Create boundary conditions in the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Boundary condition assignments with node number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
Dead Load 케이스에 자중을 적용해줘

messages.name: POST /db/self-weight
messages.content: {"SELFWEIGHT":{"LCNAME":"Dead Load","X":0,"Y":0,"Z":-1}}

Dead Load 하중케이스에 자중이 적용되었습니다.
- X 방향: 0 (없음)
- Y 방향: 0 (없음)
- Z 방향: -1 (중력 방향)
자중은 재료의 단위중량과 단면적으로부터 자동 계산됩니다.

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/self-weight","description":"Assign self-weight load to a static load case","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Self-weight assignment with load case name and direction factors"}},"required":["Assign"]}}}]

messages.content: You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
해석 실행해줘

messages.name: GET /doc/anal
messages.content: {"ANAL":{"STATUS":"SUCCESS","MESSAGE":"Analysis completed successfully","WARNINGS":0,"ERRORS":0}}

구조 해석이 성공적으로 완료되었습니다.
- 상태: 성공
- 경고: 0건
- 오류: 0건
해석 결과를 확인하실 수 있습니다.
You are a structural engineering assistant for GEN NX. Use the provided tools to execute user requests on the structural model.
5m 길이의 단순보를 만들어줘. 양쪽 끝에 절점을 배치하고, 보 요소로 연결하고, 왼쪽은 핀, 오른쪽은 롤러로 지지해줘. 재료는 SS400, 단면은 H-400x200x8x13 사용해줘.
단순보 모델을 생성하겠습니다. 먼저 재료와 단면을 정의하고, 절점과 요소를 생성한 후 경계조건을 설정하겠습니다.

messages.name: POST /db/elem
messages.content: {"ELEM":{"1":{"TYPE":"BEAM","MATL":1,"SECT":1,"NODE":[1,2],"ANGLE":0}}}

messages.name: POST /db/bncf
messages.content: {"BNCF":{"1":{"DX":true,"DY":true,"DZ":true,"RX":true,"RY":false,"RZ":false},"2":{"DX":false,"DY":true,"DZ":true,"RX":true,"RY":false,"RZ":false}}}

5m 단순보 모델이 완성되었습니다.

**재료:** SS400 강재 (탄성계수 210 GPa, 포아송비 0.3)
**단면:** H-400x200x8x13 H형강
**절점:**
- 절점 1: (0, 0, 0) - 좌측 끝
- 절점 2: (5, 0, 0) - 우측 끝
**요소:** 보 요소 1번 (절점 1→2 연결)
**경계조건:**
- 절점 1 (핀 지지): DX, DY, DZ, RX 구속
- 절점 2 (롤러 지지): DY, DZ, RX 구속 (X방향 이동 허용)

하중을 적용하고 해석을 실행하실 수 있습니다.

tools: [{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/node","description":"Create or add nodes to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Node assignments with node number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}},{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/elem","description":"Create or add elements to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Element assignments with element number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}},{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/matl","description":"Create or add materials to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Material assignments with material number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}},{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/sect","description":"Create or add sections to the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Section assignments with section number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}},{"type":"function","function":{"name":"POST /db/bncf","description":"Create boundary conditions in the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"Assign":{"type":"object","description":"Boundary condition assignments with node number as key"}},"required":["Assign"]}}},{"type":"function","function":{"name":"GET /view/capture","description":"Capture the current view of the structural model","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{},"required":[]}}}]
